## Synopsis
Using the data from the [NOAA's National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI)](https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/) we are going to analyze which weather events have had more impact, in terms of fatalities and property damage, in USA during the 21th century (from January 2001 to November 2011).
